mapper.select: select id, prop_id, prop_name, prop_type, action_type, platform_prop_ref_id, rules, defult, tips from voyageone_cms2.cms_mt_common_prop

select prop_id AS propId, prop_name AS propName, prop_type AS propType, action_type AS actionType, prop_parent_id AS parentPropId, platform_prop_ref_id AS platformPropRefId, rules AS actionRules, defult AS defaultValue, is_comm AS isCom, tips AS tips, value_type AS valueType from voyageone_cms2.cms_mt_common_prop

select prop_id AS propId, prop_name AS propName, value_type AS valType from voyageone_cms2.cms_mt_common_prop where action_type = 0 AND is_comm = 1
AND (prop_id != 'code' AND prop_id != 'priceMsrpSt' AND prop_id != 'priceMsrpEd' AND prop_id != 'priceRetailSt' AND prop_id != 'priceRetailEd' AND prop_id != 'priceSaleSt' AND prop_id != 'priceSaleEd')
AND (prop_id != 'code' AND prop_id != 'originalTitleCn' AND prop_id != 'priceMsrpSt' AND prop_id != 'priceMsrpEd' AND prop_id != 'priceRetailSt' AND prop_id != 'priceRetailEd' AND prop_id != 'priceSaleSt' AND prop_id != 'priceSaleEd')
AND (prop_id != 'priceMsrpSt' AND prop_id != 'priceMsrpEd' AND prop_id != 'priceRetailSt' AND prop_id != 'priceRetailEd' AND prop_id != 'priceSaleSt' AND prop_id != 'priceSaleEd')
order by creater
select cfg_val1, cfg_val2 from Synship.ct_user_config where user_id = #{userId} AND cfg_name = #{cfgName}
